message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a one-time price of $9,500. It's a great deal, considering its value to you is $10,000. I'm confident you won't find a better offer elsewhere.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested in the product but $9,500 is a little too high for me. Would you consider $7,000?

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $8,500. This is my final counteroffer, so I hope you can see the value in it.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, Alice.  How about we settle at $7,750?

I'm glad we're close to a deal, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing out. I can offer it to you for $8,200. This is my last counteroffer, so I hope we can finalize the deal.
